alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 11:36PM EDT until April 08 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek At Mount Marion. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Flood stage. The Esopus Creek begins to spill over its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 20.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning to 18.2 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.7 feet on 01/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Mount Marion Flood Stage: 20.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 pm: 17.4 Forecast: Fri 2 am 19.8 Fri 8 am 20.7 Fri 2 pm 18.9 Fri 8 pm 18.2 Sat 2 am 19.4 Sat 8 am 19.7 Sat 2 pm 19.4 Sat 8 pm 19.0 Sun 2 am 18.7 Sun 8 am 18.4 Sun 2 pm 18.2 Sun 8 pm 17.9 &&
